activities:
We receive blood, buccal swab, saliva and DNA samples associated with Unique Identification Number (UIN). from our clients in Europe. We (Histogenetics) does not have any personal information about the samples received.  We perform genetic testing to determine the tissue types and transfer the information back to our clients in Europe.

We do not use that information for anything else and all kept confidential and secure.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Greece, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Tissue type information of an indiviudual with UID.
privacyprograms: self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
